Package com.atakmap.android.widgets

Class WidgetItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atakmap.android.widgets.WidgetItem
  • public class WidgetItem
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines icon reference, color, and text under different states for a element of a widget.

    • Constructor Detail

      • WidgetItem

        public WidgetItem​(MapDataRef iconRef,
                  int iconWidth,
                  int iconHeight,
                  android.graphics.Point iconAnchor,
                  java.lang.String labelText,
                  int backingColor)
        Create a widget item given default criteria.
        Parameters:
        iconRef - the default icon image reference
        iconWidth - the on-screen icon width in pixels (-1) if unknown
        iconHeight - the on-screen icon height in pixels (-1) if unknown
        iconAnchor - the pixel location of the icon anchor point (in on-screen space)
        labelText - the label text for the menu item
        backingColor - the background color for the menu item (alpha supported)
